<br>

I have been a (very minor) contributor to the following R packages: 

- [PLNmodels](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/PLNmodels/index.html): Poisson Lognormal Models 

- [RGMM](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RGMM/index.html): Robust Mixture Model 
- [qch](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/qch/index.html): Query Composed Hypotheses 

- [CptPointProcess](https://github.com/Elebarbier/CptPointProcess): Change Point Detection for Point Processes
